author: ryanleeschneider
content:
^ geth seems to take `number` instead of `schema/Integer` for `blockCount` 

```
curl https://rinkeby.infura.io/v3/... -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"method":"eth_feeHistory","id":1,"jsonrpc":"2.0", "params":[3, "latest", [25,50]]}' | jq .
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 1,
  "result": {
    "baseFeePerGas": [
      "0x8",
      "0x8",
      "0x8",
      "0x8"
    ],
    "gasUsedRatio": [
      0.1078204867052677,
      0.12388843849116399,
      0.05604411458720517
    ],
    "oldestBlock": 8971975,
    "reward": [
      [
        "0x3b9aca00",
        "0x3b9aca00"
      ],
      [
        "0x3b9ac9f8",
        "0x3b9ac9f8"
      ],
      [
        "0x47868c01",
        "0x47868c01"
      ]
    ]
  }
}
```

```
curl https://rinkeby.infura.io/v3/... -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"method":"eth_feeHistory","id":1,"jsonrpc":"2.0", "params":["0x3", "latest", [25,50]]}' | jq .
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 1,
  "error": {
    "code": -32602,
    "message": "invalid argument 0: json: cannot unmarshal string into Go value of type int"
  }
}
```
